title: Our puppets
creator_credit: Geoff Russell and Video Education Australasia
brief_description: This short, fun program aims to inspire Years 6-10 Drama and Art students to explore the creative potential of puppet making and performance. It follows an energetic group of Year 7-9 students as they plan, design, construct and present their ambitious but highly successful puppet show. The program features interviews with the students and their teacher as they explore this creative medium.
